Sorry, just got done watching a video discussing card changes in Hearthstone xD
Some are silly, some I approve, some are blatant wokeness / Chinese compliance.
you surprised by that?
So far it's only 8 cards
2 of which I actually approve of, the new cards look good (it was just an art swap)
2 removed blood, Eviscerate and Bite.
Eviscerate just removed the blood from the art, otherwise it's the same, so not impressed.  Bite got an entirely new picture which isn't half bad.
The reason I say wokeness / Chinese compliance, though, are two cards in particular
The warlock card Succubus was replaced entirely with Felstalker.
And "Mistress of Pain" became "Queen of Pain" with new art
how is that woke or compliant with the Chinese?
China is cracking down on 3 things in particular
Sex / romance, violence, death.
says the country whose communist founder killed more than Hitler and Stalin combined even at his lowest estimate
*shrugs shoulders*
They swapped one authoritarian government for another
The government wants complete control over what people can see / say.  Violence and sex are rather new, though
Death has more or less been a big part of their culture.
as it has been with just about everyone
And I say "death", but what I mean are symbolic or paranormal depictions of death.
Skeletons, rotting corpses, zombies, random viscera, ghosts, etc.
A big joke in World of Warcraft is that when we run the Scholomance dungeon, all we're doing is killing many aspiring bakers! :ptv-laugh:
I think Blizzard should tell China "Stop stealing assets from our games and then we'll talk about your censorship"
The market is doing its job pretty well :P
Rainbow Six Siege tried to censor their game not too long ago to appease Chinese censorship.  The changes they made for China would become global
But backlash was so swift and fierce that they reversed the changes for all other countries.
Curious as to what they changed? :3

It's official... US society is raising a bunch of sociopaths...
Lady in Texas facing up to 20 years for licking ice cream in a grocery store before putting it back on a shelf.  It was filmed. The accomplice encouraged the behavior.  Wtf is wrong with people?!?
WTF 20 years?
why so much?
2nd degree felony tampering of a consumer product
2 - 20 years and up to $10,000 in fines
Think about it this way.  If they didn't know WHERE this lady was and what store was affected, the company could be forced to recall EVERYTHING from EVERYWHERE
Millions of dollars in product gone
And this is becoming a trend on social media...
Young people going into stores, tampering with products, then putting them back on shelves, all while being filmed by a friend
One person literally takes a bottle of Listerine, gets a giant mouthful, swishes, spits back into the bottle, puts cap back on and puts it back on the shelf
Now that's just stupid
Ok and that's just sick
wtf is wrong with people
Good news though
Investigators are in discussion with the FDA and more charges could be made
Also, they were able to identify the store with the tainted carton.  And the lady is being / potentially has been identified, and a warrant WILL be made for her arrest.
Remember, this is a FELONY.  That means no voting rights, no 2A rights once out of prison if convicted.
That's how seriously they take this shiz
OH wait, did you think she licked the carton???

and they knew where this incident happened
So she just licked some icecream in some random location and they did NOT know where?
